meanings.definition: Synergises: to work together in a way that produces an enhanced result
meanings.sent1: The team synergises to complete the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: When different departments synergise their efforts, the company sees significant growth.
meanings.sent3: The robots synergise to clean the house, making the chores seem like a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The music and dance synergise perfectly, creating a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting synergise to create a beautiful masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Synergises: the act of combining efforts to achieve a common goal
meanings.sent1: The synergises of the team led to the successful launch of the new product.
meanings.sent2: In a project, effective synergises among team members are crucial for success.
meanings.sent3: The synergises of the students in the group project made the teacher proud.
meanings.sent4: The synergises of the athletes on the field resulted in a remarkable victory.
meanings.sent5: The synergises of the volunteers made the charity event a huge success.
